entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • critical_finalization tests fails with GCStress=0x3 #75782
  • [NativeAOT] error when compiling tests #75780
  • JsonWriterHelper.Transcoding.cs replacement #75779
  • [wasm][debugger] protected override property not showing in inspector #75778
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support format specifiers #75773
    8.0.0
  • Update experimental WebAssembly templates to use consistent string quotes in JS #75771
    7.0.x
  • Vector128.ShiftRightLogical doesn't use machine-instructions for some types (`byte` / `sbyte`) #75770
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Re-enable hardware intrinsics tests when LLVM JIT is enabled for llvmaot lanes #75767
    8.0.0
  • ICorDebugThread2.InterceptCurrentException corrupts process in x64 Windows #75762
    7.0.0
  • Win32 Access Violation in EnterCriticalSection when application exits that has multiple mixed mode managed .dlls in .NET runtime inside trace.cpp trace::flush #75760
  • [API Proposal]: AsnWriter Encode with callback #75759
    Future
  • iOS app crashes on device in release build (IPA) #75758
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tracking: Upgrade LLVM-JIT to ver. 14 #75757
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `critical_finalization` runtime test fails on Linux #75756
    8.0.0
  • Web Assembly Blazor debug issue - Childeren could not be evulated #75763
    7.0.x
  • JIT: Reevaluate args sorting #75751
    8.0.0
  • Port CoreCLR PAL to linux-riscv64 #75749
  • The mscordbi.dll 6.0.922.42201 is missing from symbol servers. #75747
    8.0.0
  • Proxy doesn't authenticate on .NET 6 #75745
  • Add descriptions to WebAssembly Browser and Console App templates #75741
    7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Handle variable page size on Linux Arm64 #75737
  • PGO: Re-order blocks without side-effects #75733
    Future

Closed

  • Vxsort on Windows x64 accessing past the end of the buffer on some runtime tests #75224
    8.0.0
  • dariusmckinzie5 #75784
  • AccessViolationException when Trimming using .NET 7 preview trimming with GetTypeFromProgID #75775
  • [NativeAOT] Implement GCToEEInterface::EagerFinalized #75107
    Future
  • HttpClient crashes app with no error #75483
  • LibraryImport analyzer crashes when encountering certain attributes #75706
  • MarshallingAttributeAnalyzers throws InvalidCastException #75681
  • something about serialization #75720
  • STJ deserializes DateTime with Kind set to DateTimeKind.Unspecified when no time zone information is provided #75739
  • SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine test fails with AudioException #75753
  • Unnecessary code in System.Numerics.ConstantHelper ? #10773
    Future
  • BeginReceive Stack overflow Application crash #75660
  • [MacOS][x86] mono immediately exits with debugger-agent error #75682
  • CI failure in JIT.HardwareIntrinsics WASM test Vector64_ro: SDK Microsoft.Build.NoTargets/3.5.0 could not be found #75714

PullRequests

Created

  • Memory model document. #75790
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump 7.0 intellisense package version (WinForms docs update) #75786
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Use *_NOCTOR jit helpers version once class is initialized #75785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75783
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Fix building src/tests #75781
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove unused Utils file #75777
    area-System.Security
  • Ensure that all paths of double.Hypot use the absolute value where required #75776
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]Disable failing intrinsics tests for llvmaot CI lane, due to disabling LLVM JIT #75768
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't set JitPath for coreclr test SPMI collections #75765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #75743
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: re-enable SIMD tests on v8, and nodejs #75742
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ignore ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in WindowsConsoleStream.Write #75734
    area-System.Console, community-contribution

Merged

  • Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75746
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pad the perm table to avoid array out of bound #75364
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75761
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix edge cases of getting attribute data from syntax #75727
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{x86,s390x} (backports #75396) #75530
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix Configuration.Binder for collection properties with no setters #75723
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} (backports #75396) #75531
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Implement an AppContext compatibility switch re-enabling reflection fallback in STJ source generators. #75694
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix return code in critical_finalization test #75750
  • [DOC][MONO] Update example wasm test run command #75736
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android] Update DateTimeOffset.Now fast path routine #75457
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix wasm template README #75766
    area-Meta
  • Fix wasm template README #75696
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix edge cases of getting attribute data from syntax #75728
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75726
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Handle a null szPname field #75716
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Speech, 7.0.0
  • Free getline buffer after use #74899
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Run all EAT tests on runtime pipeline #75516
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove update to unit test for speech fix #75732
    blocking-clean-ci, area-System.Speech

Updated

  • Don't propagate const TYP_REF as TYP_I_IMPL #75661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add test mode that scans JIT disassembly output #75039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 and fix memory usage issues found while doing so #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75713
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix FailFast logging message #75718
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • R2R fixes for [Equality]Comparer.Default in jit #75422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix x64 cross build on arm64 macOS #75677
    os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75717
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix Dictionary perf regression for non-string ref type keys #75663
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Fix System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failing test on ARMv6 and Android #75458
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • JIT: Early expand vtable calls on ARM32 too #75604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] QueryPerformanceCounter in Pal should use CLOCK_MONOTONIC #75708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing some CI trigger changes #75555
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #75721
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that a member is not made more visible #23904
    Backlog
  • net6.0-macos publishes a .pkg file #27841

Updated

  • [Megathread] Engineering Status of RID Improvements and Publish UX Changes #26503
  • Turn PackageValidation on by default #23910
  • SDK searches for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version 6.0.10 and cannot find it #27888
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement publish-self-contained #27969
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Make mapping infrastructure unit testable, Ignore effectively sealed members and types and add tests #27962
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Servicing-consider, Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Update ubuntu version in template-engine.yml #27951
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Make F5 of dotnet-watch project from VS work #27947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • apicompat: add rule to check change in visibility #27929
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27919
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1996225 #27667
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1996151 #27904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #27899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expand existing warning to target 5.0 #27942
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27916
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Relax some rules in unsafe context #6453

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement the separate return scope #64100
    17.4
  • EE doesn't handle methods that span multiple documents correctly #64098
  • Add a lightbulb option for remove and sort usings #64089
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]: `IFieldSymbol.IsMarshalledExplicitly` #64087
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly functions with bool/char parameters should be an error #64086
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces 4.3.0 bug #64079
  • C# Editor Inserting Wrong Namespace #64074
    17.4
  • C#, "Move to namespace" bad performance. #64072
    17.4

Closed

  • Typo in Stack Trace Explorer after clearing contents #64073
    17.4
  • VS Toolbar does not work when StackTraceExplorer has focus #64061
    17.4
  • LSIF Generator can generate invalid JSON in hover results #64050
    17.4
  • Where is the option that "Always on" Renaming Filename when renaming symbol? #63871
    17.4
  • WorkspaceAnalyzerOptions should not access Solution.Workspace #64046
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32916.169 #64095
  • Improve error message for a `scoped ref` parameter returned by reference #62768
    Compiler.Next
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63692
    C# 12.0
  • Breaking change around contextual keyword `scoped` #63986
    17.4
  • tighten up AnalyzerOptions #8605
    Backlog
  • `IDE0074` removes comments #64051

PullRequests

Created

  • Run speedometer automatically on PR validation #64097
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add F1 test for scoped #64094
    Area-IDE, Community
  • `scoped` should set ref escape scope to current block #64093
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers
  • Enforce new grammar rules that `scoped` keyword must be immediately followed by a type possibly “prefixed” by `ref`/`ref readonly`/`in`/`out`. #64088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix parsing of lambda parameter named "scoped" #64085
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use LoadFrom instead of Load for analyzer dependencies #64076
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Fix typo in Stack Trace Explorer text #64099
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64096
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add some additional data for bug investigation #64067
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix automation names and keyboard navigation for stack trace explorer #64028
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Set output encoding properly in LSIF gen scenarios. #64092
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cleanup WorkspaceAnalyzerOptions #64081
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report static parameter type error (CS0721) on parameter type instead of method name #63975
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve diagnostic for returning scoped ref by reference #64027
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Switch to a simpler bookkeeping model for clearing the asset cache #64075
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64091
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove TextSpan from DiagnosticDataLocation. #64056
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Simplify project cache cleanup #63995
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not report an error and eat `scoped` identifier following `ref` keyword. #64021
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add test validating gotodef at end of file #64069
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused parameter #64070
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix goto-def not working on the last character in a document #64063
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64101
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Add `MatchPriority.Deprioritize` and tweak item selection #63985
    Area-IDE
  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed and Allow pointers of managed types in some contexts #64064
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Explore use of compression in sqlite #63111
    Area-IDE
  • Don't request frozen partial document for semantic tokens in proc #63984
    Area-IDE
  • Add `ILocalSymbol.IsForEach` and `IsUsing` #64004
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Update Csc.cs #63976
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR C++ breaks after writing this #44035
  • What is the difference between AddHttpClientInstrumentation and AddAspNetCoreInstrumentation #44033
  • DefaultHtmlGenerator could add min and max HTML attributes based on RangeAttribute #44031
  • Schema change limits aspnetcore session state in SQL #44028
  • Provide HttpContext to baseUriTaskFactory in UseProxyToSpaDevelopmentServer #44025
  • Blazor WASM PWA's service worker causes issue with OpenID Connect #44023

Closed

  • Hosting Multiple (React) SPAs in Asp.Net Core for development. #31229
    Backlog
  • Add WebApplicationBuilderSettingInvalidApplicationWillFailAssemblyLoadForUserSecrets back #44016
  • [Epic]: Implement Rate Limiting Middleware in aspnetcore #37384
    7.0.0
  • Perf improvement: json #44024
  • "IISExpress LaunchUrl" is not working #43886
  • Using an out parameter in a controller leads to Could not load type 'System.Char&' from assembly 'System.Private.CoreLib, Version=7.0.0.0 ...' #43256
    7.0-rc2
  • Using the System.Text.Json source generator with ASP NET Core throws NotSupportedException when attempting to serialize IEnumerable<T> #43894
    7.0-rc2
  • Debug blazor server/wasm #43989

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44034
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Get template error codes from the right processes #44032
    area-mvc, feature-templates, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44022
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update versions for 7.0.0 RTM #43992
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • Only add MethodInfo to route handler endpoints #44021
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding WebApplicationBuilderSettingInvalidApplicationDoesNotThrowWhen… #44030
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove unneeded generic params from test case #44011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCi… #44018
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/3.1] Stop building on Ubuntu 18.04 #43666
    area-infrastructure
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1995899 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GCDump collection attempt results in OverflowException #3392
    7.0.0

Closed

    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Background Color for Label and entry does not update when removing the existing color #10177
  • .NET MAUI Blazor UWP doesn't not allow camera access through javascript library or functions. #10176
  • .NET MAUI button backgroundcolor dosen't work #10172
  • .NET MAUI Set iOS Linker Behavior to "LinkAll" throws XamlParseException: 'Position 9:37. Cannot assign property "Source": Property does not exist. #10171
  • MAUI Picker with White background looks like disappered? #10170
  • Shadow Breaks TranslateTo Animation on Android #10169
  • Image does not get cleared when its Source is set to null #10165
  • Maui Shell always re-uses pages. No option to re-create on navigation #10164
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Crash during Render after adding items to an ObservableCollection #10163
    Backlog
  • Implicit styles in App.xaml are applied too early, before the class's constructor #10162
    Backlog
  • Page.OnAppearing and OnDisappearing event on Windows is raised too often #10161
    Backlog
  • [Blazor,WebView2] HTML <select> dropdown Display In Wrong Position When Moving Window #10158
  • Cannot pair to mac after latest VS2022 Windows update #10157

Closed

  • Adding ZIndex to an Image causes the app to crash when released in .NET MAUI #10173
  • Allow layout manager replacement for existing layout types #9010
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `CollectionView` requires `ScrollView` #8097
    Backlog
  • Javascript drag & drop does not work when using a WebView control. #9983
  • [Bug] Generated PNG images not displaying #10149
    Backlog
  • About the maui project error after updating VS17.3.4 #10137
  • Infinity loop lifecycle when unfocused from the app between OnDisappearing and OnAppearing #9688
  • Unable to make a circle image with a circle border with a stroke thickness #10027
    Backlog
  • Android and iOS do not report Window.Frame values #9708
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Tizen does not report Window.Frame values #9707
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Setting the X/Y positions initial values on Window doesn't propagate when the window is first initialized #9703
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Screenshot capture does not work for Blazor MAUI #9718

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix insights from crashing when using Frame and CollectionView #10168
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating on Shell using a custom TitleView #10160
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Fix Semantic Property Propagation and CV TabStop #10156
    area/a11y

Merged

  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9980
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Fix Border clipping issue #10061
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10155
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Support Window.Frame on all platforms #10028
    7.0-rc2

Updated

  • Add visual state for PointerOver #10003
    area/Xaml </>, 7.0-rc2
  • Add release 6.0.536 #10129
    area/docs 📓, community ✨
  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0-rc2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When EF7 RC is referenced from a Function App, the app throws a runtime error on startup #29123
  • Reverse engineer Synapse Serverless SQL Pool and Dynamics 365 TDS Endpoint #29121
    8.0.0
  • EF 7 RC1 - The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Guid' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Guid]' #29120

Closed

  • .NET 6 SQLite Not Working on Raspberry PI (ARM64) #29109
  • Add SQLitePCLRaw assets for .NET 7 WASM #28999
    7.0.0-rc2
  • WarningsConfiguration is not propagated correctly in SQL Server provider #29069
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Union not supported? #29027
  • Changes to property converters / ValueComparer's in efcore 7 #28984
  • ef migrations script - Unrecognized option -o error #26813
  • Still no bulk update with EF Core 7 RC? #29112

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Don't scaffold HasColumnOrder #29126
    Servicing-consider
  • Reverse engineering of Dynamics CRM TDS endpoint and Synapse Serverless SQL Pool #29122

Merged

  • Update versions for 7.0.0 RTM #29102
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Clear reference to DbDataReader from RelationalDataReader #29005
    Servicing-consider
  • Templates: Specify a groupIdentity for ef-templates #29118
  • feat: normalize migrations file #28367

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installer text is cropped #14522
  • Installer says VS 17.0 is OK, download page says it requires 17.4 #14521
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch repo to use native AzDO container support #14541
  • Remove unused XDT dependency #14525
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #14524

Merged

  • Update the minimum version in the installer UI to 17.4 (which is recommended) #14542
  • Update the minimum version in the installer UI to 17.4 #14543
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix spelling error in msbuild property reference #14531
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Remove PrivateSourceBuiltPrebuiltsPackageVersion since all prebuilts have been removed #14533
  • [release/7.0.1xx-rc2] Fix spelling error in msbuild property reference #14530
  • [release/7.0.1xx-rc2] Remove PrivateSourceBuiltPrebuiltsPackageVersion since all prebuilts have been removed #14532
  • Update to the just shipped RC1 version for all 7.0 templates and implicit versions #14517
  • Yaml and tooling fixes #14512
  • Update to newer SBRP with correct AspNetCore ref package. #14539
  • [release/7.0.1xx-rc2] Add RID argument to llvm-project repo.proj. #14535
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add RID argument to llvm-project repo.proj. #14534
  • Add Roslyn patch to use source-built versions of ref packs and not use app host #14523
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #14527
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #14515
  • Add Roslyn patch to use source-built versions of ref packs and not use app host #14518

Updated

  • Try reenabling all the tests listed in the installer repo #14467
